levels.name: Level 2: Alternate
levels.instruction: Every other key press deactivates the key...

levels.name: Level 3: Double Press
levels.instruction: Press each key twice in a row

levels.name: Level 4: Next Letter
levels.instruction: Each key types the next letter in alphabet

levels.name: Level 6: Vowels Twice
levels.instruction: Vowels need two presses, consonants one

levels.name: Level 7: Toggle Visibility
levels.hint: Remember where keys are when hidden

levels.name: Level 8: Icon First Letter
levels.instruction: Click icons - first letter is typed
levels.hint: Find icons starting with P, O, K, I

levels.name: Level 9: Reverse Order
levels.instruction: Letters fill from right to left!

levels.name: Level 10: Icon Second Letter
levels.instruction: Click icons - second letter is typed
levels.hint: Find icons with P, O, K, I as second letter

levels.name: Level 5: Invisible
levels.instruction: The keyboard is invisible. Find the keys!
